column4: I can't fully shutdown my computer on any linux I have tried.
It takes it to "system halted" and cuts off the hard drive
then I have to press the power button
you have a cut off switch on the power supply?
I don't know, I never looked at it
Something comes up complaining about the ACPI and about the 1999 year BIOS ,  and about how I'd have to force ACPI.. blah blah
Then it goes ahead and boots in to Ubuntu
<Name141> right, old stuff like that works great with ltsp
